description:
Heath was an Alliance military officer who served as a staff officer in the Alliance HQ Fleet under the command of Bruce Ashbey during the Second Battle of Tiamat. On 11 December 745 UC, Heath was injured by an Imperial attack on the supreme flagship Hard Luck and was one of the few witnesses of Ashbey`s death, who succumbed to his injuries from the same attack.
Gineipedia
name: Heath
